title: BRIEF-Swift Media Updates On Funding Of $3.6 Million To Received
text:
BRIEF-Swift Media Updates On Funding Of $3.6 Million To Received

Stock Markets 59 minutes ago (Sep 20, 2019 11:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Swift Media Updates On Funding Of $3.6 Million To Received Sept 20 (Reuters) - Swift Media Ltd : * L1 CAPITAL GLOBAL OPPORTUNITIES MASTER FUN AND LIND GLOBAL MACRO FUND LP WILL PROVIDE TOTAL FUNDING OF $3.6 MILLION TO SWIFT * CONVERTIBLE NOTES WILL BE ISSUED AT A 10% DISCOUNT TO $4 MILLION FACE VALUE OF NOTES, WITH A 12-MONTH MATURITY FROM EACH TRANCHE'S DRAWDOWN

BRIEF-Swift Media Updates On Funding Of $3.6 Million To Received
